project.name: Build
project.description:
Turbo builder main project. Used to automatize the most common development build operations.
VERY IMPORTANT!! An extra library is required to execute FTP operations with ant. Download it here: http://commons.apache.org/net/index.html
To set it up with eclipse: - Copy it to: C:\Program Files\eclipse\plugins\org.apache.ant_1.8.2.v20110505-1300\lib - Then go to "Window/Preferences/Ant/Runtime/ClassPath" and add this lib as an external jar to "Ant home entries" (Say yes to ignore possible problem if prompted)
